title: Monthly exchange rate of USD to GBP 2017 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and USD GBP exchange rate in the y axis.
The USD GBP exchange rate is highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
There is a difference of 0.11 between the maximum Month Aug 19 and minimum Month Mar 18.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and USD GBP exchange rate in the y axis.
Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate and Mar 18 has the lowest USD GBP exchange rate.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and USD GBP exchange rate in the y axis.
The USD GBP exchange rate is highest at Month Aug 19 and lowest at Month Mar 18.
There is a difference of 0.11 between the maximum Month Aug 19 and minimum Month Mar 18.
max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Month, and USD GBP exchange rate in each Month on the y axis.
Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate and Mar 18 has the lowest USD GBP exchange rate.
The difference of USD GBP exchange rate between the highest and lowest Month is 0.11.
The Month Aug 19 has the highest USD GBP exchange rate, followed by Jul 19, and Oct 18. Down to the Month Mar 18 which is the lowest.
The USD GBP exchange rate has decreased over the past 25 Months.
Month Jan 19, Sep 18, Jul 18, Jun 18, and Oct 17 have a similar USD GBP exchange rate that is 0.76.
The Month Aug 19 has 1.07 times more USD GBP exchange rate than average.
